title: Haaland Has Arrived
description:
The FC crew react to Erling Haaland's Premier League debut brace and question why there was so much criticism following his lackluster Community Shield performance. Plus, the guys break down Manchester United's awful start under Erik ten Hag after a 2-1 loss to Brighton and criticize how the club continues to use Fred and Scott McTominay in midfield.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Erling Haaland scores 2 in PL debut; Lackluster Manchester United fall to Brighton at home; Red Devils see Marko Arnautovic bid turned down
